title: Ticket #629: Create test for rescue DAG/recovery combination
description: We have a rescue DAG test and a recovery test, but we should create a test that does the combination -- run a DAG, the DAG fails creating a rescue DAG; then re-run the DAG, the rescue DAG should get run automatically; do a condor_hold/condor_release on DAGMan to have it do recovery mode.
remarks: Just added new test job_dagman_rescue_recov to take care of this (added to master/7.5 branch). wenger 2009-10-16.
check_ins: 2009-Oct-16 17:18   Check-in [16110]: Dealt with gittrac #629 (Create test for rescue DAG/recovery combination) -- created the new job_dagman_rescue_recov test. This tests a combination of rescue DAGs and recovery mode (and also node retries). (By Kent Wenger )
